name: FaceBook Dark Cosmic - Black + Transparent
description:
FIREFOX 3.6+ ONLY (6+ RECOMMENDED)

First Major Update: lots of fixes in the UI + some new icons :)
Second Major Update: It's beginning to look like something :D Anyway, if there's anything you seem to don't like or find corrupt please do not hesitate to write a comment or review. Thanks!
Third Major Update: I hope you like the new improved looks of it all :) Cheers!
